reviews.review_msg: Wendi was my FA for 401, and when I had issues with my teacher at my school, she was very condescending and acted like I was the problem. Only when I got outside help did she soften her approach and pretend to be supportive. I will never forget her trying to blame me for the issues my teacher caused in my class. If you get her as your FA, be wary.

Wendi is not pleasant to talk to and has a tendency to talk down to people when they ask her questions. My EDUC 401 class had her as the co-teacher, and I dreaded asking her questions as she refused any effort to make the program more accessible. She always acted like my needs were a chore and did bare minimum. Overly obsessed with her research.
